function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Traditional ECG monitoring systems may increase staff-to-patient contact, leading to potential cross-infections.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmitting contagious diseases such as COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Implementing wearable-based tele-ECG monitoring to reduce staff-to-patient contact.","Technologies":"Wearable ECG patches, tele-ECG monitoring systems.","People":"Medical practitioners, frontline healthcare workers, patients.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, medical device manufacturers."},{"Description":"Cuff-based blood pressure monitoring by medical staff increases their work load and the possibility of them becoming infected.","Impact":"Increased risk of healthcare workers contracting contagious diseases such as COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Implementing remote blood pressure monitoring to reduce staff work load and contact with patients.","Technologies":"Remote blood pressure monitoring devices, telemedicine platforms.","People":"Medical staff, healthcare workers, patients with underlying conditions.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, healthcare organizations, medical device manufacturers."}]}
